name: Atmos Fall
description:
ATMOS FALL

Atmos Fall is a game where you control a star ship fighting enemies in 10 short levels across the galaxy

Made to feel like a PS1 Game lost in a drawer until now :)

Controller Highly Recommended!

but otherwise...:

  • WASD/Arrows to move
  • E & Q : to aim
  • LMB : Light Cannon
  • RMB: Heavy cannon

Credits:

I or my brother made all of the content excluding:

  • PSX Shader - dsoft20
  • UI Buttons - nethergear & Xelu
  • Skybox - Matthew Pablo
  • Textures - Textures.com
  • Music - Matthew Pablo
  • Font -B-Rain
  • Explosion Textures - chabull

/\ Awesome stuff
